breadCrumbs.text: Upload pricing schedules and other documents

title: 2. Upload  pricing schedules and other documents
description1: You can use a pricing schedule to set out what you want suppliers to give prices for.This will help suppliers know what you wnat for specific costs for and will help you them evaluate fairly.
description2: You can upload your pricing schedule below
description3: You can also add more documents with information about your procurement, such as information about the context of your procurement,key terms,acronyms and information about your organizantion.

taskList.title: Upload terms and conditions and other documents
